item.title: Implicit Multimodal Alignment: On the Generalization of Frozen LLMs to Multimodal Inputs
item.description: Frozen LLMs surprisingly excel at multimodal tasks; this paper reveals that their success stems from an implicit multimodal alignment effect, paving the way for efficient LMMs.
